DOC.detailed_description: At first request neuraxial labor analgesia , cervix examine . If < 4.0 cm , patient randomize either Combined spinal epidural ( CSE ) technique intrathecal fentanyl , CSE technique intrathecal bupivacaine fentanyl , epidural de novo technique . Labor analgesia administer sit position , either L2-3 L3-4 interspace . All patient receive 500mL intravenous bolus Lactated Ringer 's solution . The epidural space locate use loss-of-resistance technique utilize 17-G Tuohy epidural needle . Patients assign intrathecal dose utilize standard needle-through-needle technique . A 19-G epidural catheter insert 5 cm epidural space maintenance epidural analgesia initiate . Patients assigned epidural de novo technique epidural space identify similar loss-of-resistance technique . The epidural catheter insert 5 cm epidural space . Epidural analgesia initiate fentanyl 100mcg + bupivacaine 0.125 % 10-20 mL ( divided dos ) . Maintenance epidural analgesia initiate . Maintenance epidural analgesia consist patient-controlled epidural analgesia ( PCEA ) bupivacaine 0.0625 % fentanyl 1.95 mcg/mL follow parameter : basal rate 8 mL/hr bolus dose = 8 mL , lock-out interval = 10 min maximum volume = 32 mL/hr . Breakthrough pain group manage use anesthesiologist administer epidural bolus bupivacaine 1.25 mg/mL , 10-15mL , without fentanyl . If instrumental vaginal delivery require , patient receive anesthesiologist administer epidural bolus chloroprocaine 30 mg/mL , 5-10 mL . If patient adequate level analgesia one-sided block , despite epidural redoses , epidural catheter replace another level 0.125 % bupivacaine 5-15 mL administer adequate level analgesia establish . Because primary outcome study duration first stage labor , regular cervical examination necessary . Typically , full cervical dilation diagnose cervical examination patient complain rectal pressure , likely late time period woman effective neuraxial analgesia compare woman systemic opioid analgesia . Therefore , duration first stage labor artificially prolong regular cervical exam perform . The investigator intend perform sterile cervical examination first request labor analgesia , routine time course labor per manage OB provider 's discretion , every 2 hour patient reach 90-100 % cervical effacement complete cervical dilation . Fetal heart rate ( FHR ) trace without information group assignment treatment modality assess perinatologist . In addition analyze FHR tracing include participant , investigator also plan analyze plasma epinephrine level draw subgroup patient . Prior placement neuraxial technique , patient include section study sample venous blood drawn . A second sample venous blood redrawn 15 minute 30 minute intrathecal dose initial epidural bolus . All three sample analyze plasma epinephrine concentration . These result compare FHR trace analysis see correlation .
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous , American Society Anesthesia Physical Status ( ASA ) 2 female > 18 yearsold term ( > 37 week gestation ) singleton vertex pregnancy spontaneous labor spontaneous rupture membrane Nonvertex presentation induction labor contraindication opioid neuraxial analgesia contraindication combine spinalepidural technique ( e.g . unfavorable airway exam ) cervical dilation > 4.0 cm administration systemic hydromorphone within 4 hour epidural request
